title: Isle Royale National Park: Seahunter III
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Transportation Services     Seahunter III                SEAHUNTER III         The Seahunter III docked at Windigo.     The Seahunter III is a 65' foot twin diesel vessel that provides passenger service to Isle Royale National Park.  It operates between Grand Portage, MN and Windigo on the southwest end of the island.  Throughout the operating season the vessel's schedule varies; it typically operates from mid-June through Labor Day.  Day-trip and overnight visits are offered.  The Seahunter III runs on central time, whereas Isle Royale National Park is on eastern time; best practice is to stay on central time during your trip.            Â    The Seahunter III departs Grand Portage, MN at 8:30 a.m. CDT / 9:30 a.m. EDT and arrives at Windigo at 10:00 a.m. CDT / 11:00 a.m. EDT.  Visitors on the day-trip have four hours to explore the west end of the park.  The Seahunter III then departs Windigo at 2:00 p.m. CDT / 3:00 a.m. EDT and arrives at Grand Portage, MN at 3:30 p.m. CDT / 4:30 p.m. EDT. For additional schedule, fare information, or to make a reservation, please visit their website.
